name: Void Knight
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhausted, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Void Gauntlet attacks or three Void Bolts.

actions.name: Void Gauntlet
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage + 18 (4d8) force. If the target is a Med or smaller creature it must make DC 16 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Void Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, 120 ft., one target, 21 (4d8+3) force.

actions.name: Pull of the Void (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Sends Void tendrils at up to three creatures it can see within 60' of it that are not behind total cover. Each target must make DC 16 strength Saving throw or be pulled up to 30' toward the knight. Then each creature within 5 ft. of knight takes 36 (8d8) force.

special_abilities.name: Call of the Void
special_abilities.desc: If creature within 5 ft. of knight attempts to move away from it that creature: DC 13 Str save or be unable to move away from knight. If creature uses magic to move (ex: misty step or freedom of movement) it automatically succeeds.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Immoveable
special_abilities.desc: Can't be moved vs. its will except by magical means. In addition knight has disadvantage on Dex (Acrobatics) and Dex (Stealth) checks.

special_abilities.name: Implosive End
special_abilities.desc: When Void knight dies it collapses in on itself releasing a wave of Void energy. Creature within 5 ft. of it: 18 (4d8) force (DC 16 Dex half).
